metadata.title: CVE-2017-14645 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in AP4_BitStream::ReadBytes inCodecs/Ap4BitStream.cpp in Bento4 version 1.5.0-617. The vulnerabilitycauses an application crash, which leads to remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
